metadata.title: CVE-2019-8425 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
includes/database.php in ZoneMinder before 1.32.3 has XSS in theconstruction of SQL-ERR messages.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-8425` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

zoneminder - 1.30.4+dfsg-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: zoneminder package in esm-apps/focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.30.4+dfsg-1').
